# Docs

## Getting Started

This guide will help you get started with Claude Codex.

### Installation

```bash
npm install -g @claude-codex/cli
# or
bun add -g @claude-codex/cli
```

### Basic Usage

```bash
claude-codex --help
```

### Next Steps

* Read the [API Reference](/api/core)
* Check out the [CLI Reference](/api/cli)
